verse: स वा एष आत्मा हृदि तस्यैतदेव निरुक्त हृद्ययमिति तस्माद्धृदयमहरहर्वा एवंवित्स्वर्गं लोकमेति॥

terms.सः (saḥ): that (referring to the previous mentioned subject)

meaning: That soul resides in the heart of a person, and this is indeed explained as the heart. It moves day and night or in this manner, it attains the heavenly realm.
